com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.scoreboard

Class AbstractScoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.components.scoreboard.AbstractScoreboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scoreboard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BukkitScoreboard, PersonalScoreboardFeature.GlobalScoreboard

    public abstract class AbstractScoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scoreboard
    Abstract implementation of a scoreboard, implements some limited functionality

      • addLine

        public void addLine(int key,
                    @Nonnull
                    ScoreboardLine line)
        Description copied from interface: Scoreboard
        adds a new line to this scoreboard. the key specifies the position, higher key being higher "rank" on the board
        if there is a line with that key already, it gets overridden!
        Specified by:
        addLine in interface Scoreboard
        Parameters:
        key - the position of the line
        line - the line to add

      • addLine

        A new line is will always be added on the top.

                   java.lang.String key,
                   @Nonnull
                   ScoreboardLine line)
        Description copied from interface: Scoreboard
        adds a new line to this socreboard, named key for easy access.
        A new line will always be added on the top.
        if there is a line with that key already, it gets overridden!
        Specified by:
        addLine in interface Scoreboard
        Parameters:
        key - the name of this line, for easy access
        line - the new line
        Returns:
        the position of the line on the scoreboard
